comment: Nikolov was awesome; incredibly kind and caring, definitely wanted to see his students succeed. He took on the class last minute so it was a little disorganized but you could follow along pretty easily. Just a discussion post a week plus a semester long project that you could do alone or with a group. Pretty painless class overall. Definitely take!

comment: Dr. Nikolov is worth taking, there is nothing outstanding about him, but the course is not hard, and he responds timely and works with his students. I would take him again.

Dr. Nikolov is great and made our lectures really interesting. His course is mainly 2 group projects (50% of grade), online chapter quizzes (20%), and weekly reflections (20%). Pretty straightforward class and easy as long as you stay on top of it. Lecture is a little disorganized but lots of room to participate. Would take again!

comment: Class consisted of weekly discussions, exams (lockdown), and a group project. Very reasonable due dates. Professor was responsive to email questions and cared for his students. I highly recommended Dr. Nik Nikolov!

Discussion posts that are turned in whenever you want, one group project, and two open note exams, professor Atanas (or Nik) is a great online professor! Definitely take him for international marketing.
